jobs.title: Part time freelancer
jobs.description: Occasionally I work on Upwork and found clients on social media platforms to improve my Adobe Photoshop / Illustrator skills. I enjoy communicating with clients so that I could better understand their needs.

educations.title: Curs Graphic Designer
educations.description: I finished a course that introduced me to the main Photoshop tools such as pen tool, color change, text over image, image transform, resolution adaptation, etc. I was also introduced to Adobe Illustrator, being the main vector program in which I create logos, pamphlets, business cards, etc. Perfecting these skills has given me the ability to learn more complicated concepts in Adobe Photoshop: Photo manipulation, Blending images, threads, lighing, shadows and other effects.
